      Methods in com.revature.banking that throw TransactionException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String BankTeller.addFunds(int account, double amount)
      This should add the amount specified to the account specified for this user.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> BankTeller.closeAccount(int account)
      Close (deletes) the specified account and returns a list of updated accounts (or an empty list if there are no others).
      java.lang.String BankTeller.createAccount(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String taxID, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Creates an account (and opens a bank account with zero balance) with the given credentials.
      void BankTeller.deleteUser()
      Deletes user from system.
      java.lang.String BankTeller.openNewAccount()
      Creates a new account for currently logged on user.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> BankTeller.transferFunds(int withdrawAccount, int transferAccount, double amount)
      Transfers funds between two accounts (owned by the same, logged in, user).
      void BankTeller.userLogin(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Used to login a user.
      void BankTeller.userLogout()
      Logs user out (discards any data needed to interact with this user).
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> BankTeller.viewAccounts()
      This method should return a list of Strings that represent the state of the currently logged on user's accounts.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> BankTeller.viewStatement(int account)
      Return a List of strings representing the specified accounts bank statements (withdrawals and deposits),
      java.lang.String BankTeller.withdrawFunds(int account, double withdrawal)
      Withdraws the amount specified from the specified account.
